entry.title: V2.3 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.
Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!
**Content Requirement**
Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.
We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!
**How to Submit**
Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.
**Submission Period**
2025/04/28 - 2025/06/02 (PT)
**Judging Criteria**
All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.
**Notes**
To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.
Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.
You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.
Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:
- Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves
- Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights
- Works submitted outside the event period
- Works created with the assistance of AI technology
- Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism
- Works that have already been used for commercial purposes
- Works deemed inappropriate by the judges
Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.
This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rover,
Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion.
# Maintenance Time & Compensation Details
- Maintenance Time: 2025-04-29 04:00 - 2025-04-29 11:00 (UTC+8)
- Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
- Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
*In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.*
- Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300
- Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
# Special Notice
The rewards contained in the "Wuthering Waves Pre-registration and Social Media Follower Milestones Achieved" mail and "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail expire on 2025-05-22 at 11:59 (UTC+8). Be sure to claim them in time.
New Rovers who create a character and unlock the Mails feature between 2025-05-22 12:00 and 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8), before Version 2.4 goes live, will still receive these two mails, along with the rewards contained within.
*Rovers who created or create a character before 2025-05-22 12:00 (UTC+8) will not receive these two mails again.*
- Eligibility: New Rovers who create a character and unlock the Mail feature between 2025-05-22 12:00 and 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8).
- Notes:
1. The rewards contained in the reissued "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail will remain claimable until the Version 2.4 update maintenance.
2. The reissued "Wuthering Waves Pre-registration and Social Media Follower Milestones Achieved" mail will be marked as a Starred Mail and will remain valid permanently.
3. The "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail contains the item "Voucher of Reciprocal Tides x1." Following the Version 2.4 update maintenance, this item will become invalid, and its associated [Giveback Custom Convene] event will close. Be sure to claim and use the item before 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8).
4. Version 2.4 will introduce a feature that allows Rovers who register after the release of Version 2.4 to obtain some of the rewards contained in the above mails by completing beginner quests.
# Version Update Details
# New Resonators
5-Star Resonator: Zani (Spectro/Gauntlets)
A member of Averardo Vault's security team and holder of "Best Employee" for longer than she cares to count.
She has made plenty of plans for her free time, but for now, her biggest mission is simple: clocking out on time.
## Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Heavy Attack DMG, Spectro DMG Amplification, Spectro Frazzle
*Obtainable through the [Between Light and Shadow] Featured Resonator Convene.*
5-Star Resonator: Ciaccona (Aero/Pistols)
A wandering bard from Rinascita, Ciaccona. She sings not only for the Divinity, but also for the common folk.
She records stories along her journeys, turning them into songs that evoke laughter, emotion, and tears in both the storytellers and the audience.
## Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Traction, Aero Erosion
*Obtainable through the [Through Verses and Rhythms] Featured Resonator Convene.*
# New Weapons
5-Star Weapon: Blazing Justice (Gauntlets)
It heralds justice, precise and inexorable as a clock's toll. All sins are cleansed in flame, dissipating like night beneath the dawn's gaze.
*Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Blazing Justice] Featured Weapon Convene.*
5-Star Weapon: Woodland Aria (Pistols)
All things exist within the lines of poetry. Every sound has its meters and rhymes.
The forest's melodies ascend in spirals toward the moon's silvered grace, harmonized by the nightingales' chorus. When the final note falls and vanishes into the silent earth, a flawless chord echoes endlessly in the depths of this boundless realm.
*Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Woodland Aria] Featured Weapon Convene.*
# New Stories
Zani's Companion Story: A Blaze in the Dark
A case unfolds at midnight, an echo of Ragunna's turbulent past.
Now, the city is once again shrouded in its shadows. Only a blaze of light can banish the encroaching darkness.
- Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.3 update.
- Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to unlock.
Event Quest: Your Summer Will Never Wither
A rumor about Daemons is spreading through the streets of Ragunna, with an article pointing to the former Poets Society—The Golden Anthem. As you dig deeper, you uncover a tragic story deliberately concealed by The Order.
- Duration: 2025-05-22 10:00 - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
- Eligibility: Reach Union Level 14. Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III to gain early access. For a better experience, complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" first.
# New Events & Gameplay Features
Anniversary Events:
[Cube, Cubic n Cubie] Anniversary Combat Event
The Second Coming of Solaris's Anniversary is approaching, but trouble has struck the Cube World! The mysterious demon king Abbowser has captured all Cubes and challenged the legendary Black Cat Warrior. "Step into the unknown, face my minions, rescue your lost friends, and face me in a big showdown! Come on, it's going to be a blast!"
- Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event
Log in during the event period to claim the rewards.
- Duration: 2025-05-23 00:00 (UTC+8) - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Cubie Derby] Anniversary Spectator Event
During the event, 12 Cubes will take part in elimination rounds in 2 Groups, with 1 round taking place per day and 10 rounds in total to decide the Ultimate Race Winner.
- Duration: 2025-05-14 08:00 - 2025-05-26 03:59 (server time)
[Cubie Derby: Warmup] Anniversary Leisure Event
Victory does not come easily. A Cube's got to sweat a little to win the race! Join the Cubes in training, complete practice rounds to earn some exciting rewards!
- Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
[Memory Travelogue] Anniversary Photo Collection Event
KU-Lolo has a new idea to turn your fondest memories into unique Cube souvenirs in the Second Coming of Solaris!
- Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gilded Nightmarket] Anniversary Points Exchange Event
Complete Nightmarket Tasks to earn Nightmarket Tokens, which can be exchanged for various items in the Gilded Nightmarket.
- Availability of Nightmarket Tasks: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
- Availability of Gilded Nightmarket: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-23 03:59 (server time)
Anniversary Web Events:
[Resounding Waves] Anniversary in Numbers
Resounding Waves is an event where you can review the milestones you've achieved over the past year. Do you remember any of them? Participate in the event to access your very own story. After reading the story, you will become eligible for a special anniversary gift.
- Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-07-23 23:59 (server time)
[It's Carnevale Time!] Anniversary Returnee Invitation Event
The celebration is about to begin. Invite your friends back to join the fun in Rinascita. Complete tasks together to earn Astrites and other rewards!
- Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 23:59 (UTC+8)
Special Events:
[Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival
Encounter a variety of events during the Solaris Film Festival. Use Film Rolls to explore stories and reach different endings!
- Duration: 2025-05-22 04:00 - 2025-08-01 03:59 (server time)
[Your Summer Will Never Wither] Story Event
This is a mini Sonoro Sphere created by Ciaccona's Forte, the Realm of Melodies. In this space, stories of the past replay in fragments, and it takes clues and deduction to get the full picture.
- Duration: 2025-05-22 10:00 - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
[Beyond the Waves: Rinascita] Featured Exploration Event
Participate and upload your exploration record at the Lollo courier truck to get various rewards!
- Duration: 2025-05-29 04:00 - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gifts of Grand Reunion] 7-Day Login Event
During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.
- Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gifts of Melodic Verses] Limited-Time Login Event
During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.
- Duration: 2025-06-05 04:00 - 2025-06-19 03:59 (server time)
# Other New Content
## [Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain] Challenges: Fleurdelys, Lorelei
## \[Phantom Echoes\]: Phantom - Nimbus Wraith, Phantom - Chest Mimic, Phantom - Crownless, Phantom - Nightmare Crownless
# Anniversary Specials
Flight Aspect: The Laureate
*Participate in [Cubie Derby: Warmup] Anniversary Leisure Event to obtain*
Avatar: Moment of Resonance
*Participate in [Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event to obtain*
Sigil: Once Together
*Participate in [Cube, Cubic n Cubie] Anniversary Combat Event to obtain.*
# Limited-Time Rewards from Past Events
Projection: Somnoire Anchor, Projection: Ocean's Gift, Phantom: Dreamless, Phantom: Inferno Rider, Phantom: Lorelei
*Participate in [Gilded Nightmarket] Anniversary Points Exchange Event to obtain."*
# Adjustments and Optimizations
# Resonators & Weapons
## Echo Aspect
New Feature: Echo Aspect
- This feature allows you to apply Glide or Flight Aspects to your Resonators.
- You can apply an Echo Aspect to the current Resonator or all the Resonators.
- Glide or Flight Aspects do not affect Resonators' performance.
# Enemies & Echoes
- Optimized the performance of the model for the enemy Fleurdelys in Weekly Challenge: The Wheel of Broken Fate.
- Optimized the visual effects of the Echo skill "Reminiscence: Fleurdelys" in combat.
# Features
## Profile
New Feature: Birthday Blessing
- Set your date of birth via Terminal > Profile > Set Birthday.
- Once you've set your date of birth and reached Union Level 2, the Birthday Blessing feature will be unlocked.
- Log in on the day of your birthday or within 7 days after to receive a unique birthday surprise.
- If you log in after the 7 days have passed but still within 30 days after your birthday, the gift will still be sent to you via Mail.
- If your birthday has already passed when you finish the initial birthdate setting, you can still receive the birthday blessings and gift for the current year via in-game mail.
- You can return to the birthday space anytime by using the Supermassive Birthday Cake in your Backpack.
- You can go to your Backpack to put on the special birthday gift "The Stars that Shine For You."
*Please note that your date of birth cannot be changed once set. Be sure to enter the correct date.*
## Story
New Feature: Glossary
- Underlined hyperlinks are added to in-game terminology during quests.
- Clicking on a hyperlinked term will bring up its definition.
## Reprise of Tides
Upgraded [Reprise of Tides] Returnee Event
- Added new 7-Day Login and Returnee Quests, available to Rovers who have not logged in for 60 consecutive days or more.
- Added Progress Rewards.
- Added Double Drop.
- Added Returnee Bundles.
- Added a Returnee Feedback Survey.
- Adjusted the requirements for certain Returnee Quests and Tide Note.
- Optimized the UI design of certain pages.
*For more details about the optimizations made to Reprise of Tides, please refer to the Returnee Event Upgrade Notice.*
## Pioneer Podcast
Upgraded Pioneer Podcast
- Increased the quantity and overall Rarity of Public Channel and Insider Channel materials.
- Added new Public Channel and Insider Channel rewards for certain levels.
- Added a new options to open Pioneer Podcast Supply Packs.
- Added a new Connoisseur Channel reward.
- Adjusted the Podcast Task rewards.
- Adjusted the weekly Podcast EXP limit.
- Optimized the display of Insider Channel rewards.
*For more details on the optimizations made to Pioneer Podcast, please refer to the Pioneer Podcast Event Details.*
# Leveling
## Data Bank
New Feature: Data Modification
- Visit the page via Terminal > Data Bank > Data Modification.
- Use a Modifier to adjust the first Mainstat of an unenhanced 5-star Echo into the designated stat.
- Echoes that have been modified will be locked automatically.
*After Version 2.3 goes live, the following rewards will be provided to try out the Data Modification feature: Modifier x3, Crystal Solvent x2. To claim them, create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8); the rewards will remain claimable until the next version update.*
# Challenges, Puzzles, & Events
## Enemy Respawn
Adjustments to Boss Challenges and Nightmare Echo Challenges
- Adjusted the respawn mechanics of Boss Challenges. After defeating an enemy, you can select between "Claim Rewards" and "Restart." If you select "Restart," the enemy will reappear immediately.
- Adjusted the respawn mechanics of Nightmare Echo Challenges. After an enemy is defeated, it will respawn if you wait for a few seconds.
## Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways (Weekly Combat Challenge)
Adjustments to Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways
- Adjusted the effects and descriptions of certain Metaphors. This adjustment will take effect when Version 2.3 goes live.
- Adjusted the amount of Dreamscape Energy that can be obtained in certain situations, making them easier to obtain. Please note that this adjustment will take effect after 2025-06-02 04:00.
- Adjusted some of the instructional text in Tutorials.
- Optimized the quest guide for Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud.
# Controls
## Auto Sprint
Added Auto Sprint and Sustain Sprint
- Enable the options via Settings > Controls.
- With Auto Sprint enabled, your character will sprint automatically after sprinting for 1.5s.
- With Sustain Sprint enabled, when your character has sprinted for a certain amount of time, the Sustain Sprint icon will appear. When the sprint is sustained, the control input is no longer required.
- Now supports BACKBONE
1. Lightning Connector, compatible with iOS.
2. Type-C Connector, compatible with both Android and iOS.
- Added prompts on the Settings page for certain buttons when using a Controller.
- Added the option of using left stick on the Controller to navigate the "Obtainable via" panel on the Item Details window.
- Added the option of reassigning the Basic Attack and Dodge buttons on Keyboard & Mouse.
- Improved the precision of cursor movement when using a Controller.
# UI
- Added new loading screens for the corresponding version. The new loading screen will be shown first after a successful login.
# Graphics & Performance
## Graphics Settings
Broader Ray Tracing Support
- In addition to the RTX 40 series and RTX 50 series, Ray Tracing will become available for the following NVIDIA graphics cards:
1. RTX 2070 and newer from the RTX 20 series.
2. RTX 3060 and newer from the RTX 30 series.
- Ray Tracing will also be available for AMD graphics cards that meet the following requirements:
1. Minimum 10 GB VRAM
2. Hardware support for Ray Tracing
*Excluding 6700, 6700M, 6700 XT, 6700S, 6750 XT, 6750 GRE, RX 7600, 7600M, 7600 XT, 7600M XT, 7600S, and 7650 GRE.*
*The Dev Team is currently working to expand Ray Tracing support to the RX 9000 series. Stay tuned to official announcements for updates on the availability.*
- Ray Tracing will also be available for Intel graphics cards that meet the following requirements:
1. With at least 10 GB of VRAM
2. With hardware that supports Ray Tracing
- Added system checks and prompts regarding your device's ability to support Ray Tracing.
- Added an On/Off option for Ray-Traced Shadows.
- Optimized the performance of the game with Ray Tracing enabled.
- Optimized the effects of Ray-Traced Reflections when Ray Tracing is enabled.
Wider 120 FPS Support
- In addition to the RTX 40 series and RTX 50 series, the 120 FPS option will become available for the following NVIDIA graphics cards:
1. RTX 2070s and newer from the RTX 20 series.
2. RTX 3060 and newer from the RTX 30 series.
- Made the 120 FPS option available for AMD RX 6600 XT or newer.

entry.content:
Dear Rover,
To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion.
During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
# Maintenance Time & Compensation Details
- Maintenance Time: 2025-04-29 04:00 - 2025-04-29 11:00 (UTC+8)
- Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
- Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
*In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.*
# How to Update
Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.
- PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."
- Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.
- iOS: Download/update the game in the App Store.
- Mac: Download/update the game in the App Store.
- PS5™: Open the home screen > Select Wuthering Waves > Press the OPTIONS button to Check for Update
# Added Pre-download on Mobile
Starting with Version 2.3, Wuthering Waves supports pre-download both on mobile devices and through the PC launcher, available simultaneously.
- Pre-download Start Time: 2025-04-27 10:00 (UTC+8)
# How to Pre-download
- PC Launcher: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the resources.
*PC Pre-download Size: 6 GB. To ensure the smoothness of subsequent processes, such as decompressing, it is recommended that you have at least 12 GB of spare storage space on your PC.*
- Mobile: When pre-download for the latest version becomes available, press the "Pre-download" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page, and confirm to pre-download the resources.
*Mobile Pre-download Size: 6GB. Approximately 20 GB of storage space is needed for the decompression process. This space will be used only temporarily and will be freed up once the update maintenance is complete.*
*You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing on your mobile device or the PC launcher. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, pre-downloading will speed up the game update process to a certain degree.*
*Please ensure that you have a stable network connection during the pre-downloading process.*
